title: Diane 100% Cotton Balls, DEE051, 100 Count (Pack of 1)
description: Diane Cotton Balls are great for doing your nails, touching up or removing makeup, and many other grooming and personal needs. One bag provides a total of 100 pure cotton balls. To use for face cleansing, including eye makeup removal, simply add a pea-sized amount of makeup remover to a cotton ball. Close eyes, and gently wipe lids, lashes and lips. For nail polish removal, soak cotton ball in nail polish remover, and gently wipe nail polish off nails. Diane cotton products are biodegradable, and our packaging is reusable and recyclable. Every medicine cabinet should have cotton balls, as it’s a versatile, multifunctional beauty tool and accessory.
